snippet: The Democratic super PAC backing President Obama raised $10 million in August, a record increase in contributions that may be a demonstration of growing concern among some elite Democratic donors that Republican outside groups will swamp Mr. Obama's...
abstract: The Democratic super PAC backing President Obama raised $10 million in August, a record increase in contributions that may be a demonstration of growing concern among some elite Democratic donors that Republican outside groups will swamp Mr. Obama's re-election effort

headline.main: Priorities USA Action Reports Record Monthly Donations
